sentences.eng: I like looking at myself in the mirror!
sentences.rus: [Люблю|любить|to like (нравиться); to love] смотреть на себя в зеркало!

sentences.eng: I am so pretty!
I am much slimmer than Merlyn Monroe was.
Without a doubt,
Merlyn Monroe was fatter than I am.
I am taller than Maria Sharapova.
Of course,
Maria Sharapova is shorter than me.
In fact,
she is stronger than me,
but it doesn’t matter.
To my mind,
I am much more attractive
than Angelina Jollie.
Although she is much more successful than me:
she is lucky with her husband!
My husband is shorter than Brad Pitt
and he is absolutely bald.
Oh well,
I am not going to get upset over nothing.
sentences.rus: я не собираюсь [расстраиваться|расстраиваться|to get upset] по пустякам.

sentences.eng: All I should do is to look at myself in the mirror
sentences.rus: Мне нужно просто посмотреть на себя в зеркало.

sentences.eng: and, as usual, it will cheer me up!
sentences.rus: И это, [как всегда|как всегда, как обычно|as usual], поднимет мне настроение!
